gameDetails.name: Quadropolis: High-Tech Factory
gameDetails.description:
A promo tile part of the No Pun Intended 2017 Financing Kickstarter campaign: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/771073763/no-pun-included-a-board-game-review-series/description.

It features a high-tech plant with a factory symbol (factory), which requires 1 inhabitant & 1 unit of energy for activation and grants 3VP.

The tile has 3208Z code and replaces a tile 3208 from round 3. The old tile gives 2 energy, requiring one citizen, the new one gives 3p, but requiring citizen AND energy
